<title level="1" right="Action">[Flyby Attack](/Actions.aspx?ID=2276) <actions string="Two Actions" /></title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

The bird [Flies](/Actions.aspx?ID=94) and makes a talon Strike at any point along the way.
